title: Tiffany and Pirate sports faces
content:
Dennis Ortiz-Lopez has done a lot of propietary fonts based on a team's logo or uniform lettering.   
   
 [http://www.ortiz-lopez.com/OLP17.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000943/http:/www.ortiz-lopez.com/OLP17.html)   
   
Cap'N Howdy from Harold's Fonts and   
Tenement from Randy might be out   
of the ballpark.   
   
 [http://members.aol.com/fontner/frontpage.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000943/http:/members.aol.com/fontner/frontpage.html)   
 [http://www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/10940.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525000943/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/10940.html)
author: bjharvey
